entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023
